sections.text: Right to require confirmation or rescission of the contractImmediately after discovering the incapacity, a party, who at the time of contracting was ignorant of the incapacity of the other party, may require from that party, if the incapacity has ceased, or from the legal representative if it has not, that the contract be confirmed or rescinded.Acts 1984, No. 331, ยง1, eff.
